['DescriptionPerfectly positioned within the heart of Creek Island, at Creekside 18 you are just a short walk away from Emaar Square, the city’s new global retail destination. descriptions:
['DescriptionKnight Frank is pleased to offer this stunning brand new five bed villa at new development Balqis Residence, Palm Jumeirah, Dubai. The property boasts direct sea view and marina views with a private residents beach.
Property highlight 
• BUA: 14,425 sqft
• Basement, Ground, First and Terrace
• Full Resort Services
• 5 bedrooms + Maids
• Cinema Room and ample storage
• Direct Beach access
• Large Wrap Around Terrace with Jacuzzi
• View of Dubai marina skyline and the Arabian Sea
An incredible villa, located at the brand new stunning Balqis Residences. The basement consists of parking, cinema room and maids quarter.  On the ground floor you are greeted by a hallway, which leads you to the main living/dining area with access to private terrace. The ground floor also consists of guest bedroom. It has a well-proportioned fully equipped kitchen and a spiral staircase which will take you up 2 levels.
The villa also benefits having its own private lift from basement level to roof terrace. The 1st floor houses the master bedroom with dressing and access to large private terrace plus a further 3 bedrooms all with en- suite, lounge and study. The roof terrace (1500 Sq ft) comes with its own lounge area boasting 360 degree views of the sea.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is pleased to offer you this C type. This re modeled Camellia is offered fully furnished and is  set on an extra large and unique plot of 15711 sq ft with it's own private pool and a custom made majlis in the garden.
Setting itself apart from any other type C villa's, this special home offers the only corner plot that is a Camellia floor plan within Al Barari. The villa is in perfect condition and has been upgraded and the built-up area has been extended throughout to offer 5 en suite bedroom, a study, gym, basement,  & generous staff quarters.
This home has been modified to offer 3  living areas consisting of a separate formal and informal family living and additional dining areas, opening up to the garden and pool. Tucked away in the service area you will find a service kitchen, as well as a laundry room. The large basement is ideal as a cinema or games room and has an adjoining shower room and kitchen. The villa offers a large roof terrace which has an additional self-contained studio apartment ideal for staff quarters.
Al Barari is a secluded paradise that will offer a unique living experience in Dubai. This lavish villa is perfect for the discerning clients looking to combine elegant living spaces with idyllic views.
Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property."]

Marina.
This full floor penthouse has been remodelled with extraordinary attention to detail and a no expense spared attitude. The result is the most stunningly designed and furnished penthouse with panoramic views over the Dubai Eye and The Palm Jumeirah.
From the custom built Hacker kitchen, the state of the art Dolby Atmos cinema , the white lacquer library to the well-appointed gym, no detail has been overlooked.
Hermes, Pierre Frey curtains, Thassos marble, ebony architrave, Portoro wood side tables are amongst the connoisseur brands and fittings used.
The building offers all one would expect from a luxurious development of its stature, including security teams and systems, valet parking,a temperature-controlled rooftop pool, landscaped gardens designed by Andrew Pfeiffer, a cutting-edge technology fitness centre designed by tennis superstar Roger Federer.  Within walking distance to the beach, upmarket five star hotels and excellent restaurants this unique property offers a complete and established lifestyle experience.
This apartment has to be seen to be appreciated. For  private viewing please do not hesitate to contacting us.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionArta Real Estate Brokers would like to offer a 1 Bedroom Apartment in Emirates Garden Rose 1 and size: 1,137.96 sq ft.
The Emirates Garden development in Jumeirah Village Circle offers a choice of studio, one and two-bedroom apartments in themes of the Mediterranean and Arabic architecture. Beautifully finished, apartments have large balconies or terraces that overlook the attractive neighborhood with its shops and restaurants at street level. The buildings of the development are unlike the typical high-rise towers of the city, and provide an unusual and attractive alternative, reaching just four stories in height. Quality amenities, such as the swimming pool, health club, gymnasium, and barbecue facilities along with the children’s play area, ensure all ages are happy and entertained whilst at home. At night, there are spectacular views of the city lights.
About Us:
Founded in 2014, Arta Real Estate Brokers is an innovative, creative and forward-thinking real estate company in Dubai, UAE. At the core of our business philosophy is a commitment to extraordinary service, honesty, and clear communication.']
